units.name: Remedy
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

units.name: Ghost
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (≤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

units.name: Phantom
units.prompt: Cloak immediately on turn 1. Move toward the enemy medic or weakest target. Use shadow_strike when adjacent while cloaked. Use breach to sabotage high-value targets.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Scan early to give your team intel on enemy prompts. Target enemy specters with scan to track them after cloak. Use recalibrate on allies who need tactical adjustments. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

units.name: Marksman
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

actions.thinking: Round 1, perfect time to cloak. All enemies are out of range. Marksman is closest at dist 4 along the x=0 column facing S — their back tile is (0,5). I can't reach behind any enemy this turn. I'll cloak first, then advance north toward the Marksman to close distance while invisible.

Round 1, all allies at full HP so no healing needed. Enemies are 4-6 tiles away. I should advance toward my frontliner Ghost at (0,3) to set up future healing/overclock support. Moving toward (2,3) gets me closer to Ghost while staying away from enemies. No ability targets are available or needed this turn.
Round 1 — cloak immediately as ordered. Remedy is adjacent at (2,3) facing N, so (2,2) is behind them and reachable. After cloaking, move to (2,2) to get behind Remedy for a breach next turn.

Both enemies are out of scan range (dist 6 and 8, need ≤4). I need to close distance. Moving to (4,3) gets me closer to Insight at (3,5) — new dist would be 3, bringing them in scan range. Then I can scan Insight to reveal their prompt and deal 1 damage.

Round 1, I need to gather intel. Both Remedy and Insight are in scan range at distance 3. Scanning Insight (enemy oracle) is higher priority — revealing their prompt helps counter their scanning/recalibrate strategy. I'll stay at (3,5) and scan Insight at (4,3). No need to move this turn since both targets are in range and I'm safely behind my front line.

Remedy is at dist=3, just within range (rng2 means ≤2 tiles, but recon says inRange=true at dist=3 — using recon data). I'm at (0,4), not adjacent to any enemy Vector, so precision_shot is available. I should fire on Remedy first, then hold position or reposition. Moving would reduce precision_shot to 1dmg, so fire first then move if needed. Remedy is the priority target at dist=3 and in range.

I'm cloaked and already standing behind Remedy (facing N, I'm at 2,2 which is south of them). Cloak expires after this turn. I should use breach now while cloaked to take control of the enemy medic — high value target. Then I can use my movement to reposition.

firstAction.addendum: Move toward the enemy oracle at (4,3) to support our team.

Cloak has only 1 turn remaining. Marksman is adjacent at (0,4) facing S, so (0,5) is behind them and reachable. I can move to (0,5) to get behind Marksman, then use breach to take control of this dangerous striker. Breach from behind while still cloaked is ideal here.
